connectionStringName.desc: This is and URI format for connecting to PackageManagementService.
This is and URI format for connecting to Solr server.
64 character key represented in hexadecimal format used for cryptography

64 character key represented in hexadecimal format used for internal api communication

add.name: site:enter
add.comment: The right to enter a site.
add.title: Site Enter

add.name: insert:show
add.comment: Determines if the user can see the insert option
add.title: Show in Insert

add.name: workflowState:delete
add.comment: The right to delete an item based on its workflow state.
add.title: Workflow State Delete

add.name: workflowState:write
add.comment: The right to write an item based on its workflow state.
add.title: Workflow State Write

add.name: workflowCommand:execute
add.comment: The right to execute a workflow command.
add.title: Workflow Command Execute

add.name: profile:customize
add.comment: The right to input out of range values of profile keys, that belong to this profile.
add.title: Customize Profile Key Values

add.comment: Wildcard right. For internal use only.

add.name: remote:fieldread
add.comment: Field Read right for remoted clients.
add.title: Field Remote Read

add.comment: remote:field for remote access to fields.
